title: Can Democrats capitalize on Republican woes?
itunes:title: Can Democrats capitalize on Republican woes?
description: President Trump's approval ratings are at historic lows.The GOP's tax and healthcare bills have been panned. Sexual misconduct scandals may define the party. Democrats are being handed a golden opportunity, but will they blow it?
itunes:summary: President Trump's approval ratings are at historic lows.The GOP's tax and healthcare bills have been panned. Sexual misconduct scandals may define the party. Democrats are being handed a golden opportunity, but will they blow it?

author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
